snippet.title: Advanced Animations: UIViewPropertyAnimator Blur Effect (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
Want to learn an advanced blur effect that you can apply to your application?  In this lesson we'll dig deep into some basics of working with UIViewPropertyAnimator to give us a gradual blur using UIVisualEffectView and UIBlurEffect.  Very interesting and hope you enjoy.

Tinder Firestore Swipe and Match
